text: Titouan Perrin-Ganier (born 28 June 1991) is a French cross-country mountain biker. He specializes in the cross-country eliminator event, in which he was world champion in 2017 as in 2018 and 2019. He was also European champion in the cross-country eliminator in 2017 and 2018. Ganier is a five-time national cross-country eliminator champion, winning five consecutive years, from 2013 to 2017. ==References== Category:French male cyclists Category:Living people Category:1987 births
title: Titouan Perrin-Ganier
